insa.h4401.model

Class PathGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • insa.h4401.model.PathGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraph

    public class PathGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraph
    This class represents a graph with vertices representing Path object, allowing to find the best way to visit each node thanks to a ITSP algorithm for example. This class implements the IGraph interface, used bye the ITSP algorithm.
    Author:
    Lisa, Estelle, Antoine, Pierre, Hugues, Guillaume, Paul
    See Also:
    IGraph

      Constructs an empty Path Graph.

    • Method Detail

      • getNbArcs

        public int getNbArcs()
        Specified by:
        getNbArcs in interface IGraph
        Returns:
        The total count of arcs in the graph.

      • getCost

        public float getCost(int firstVertexNumber,
                     int secondVertexNumber)
        Returns the cost of the walk between two vertices, representing by their number. The number of a vertex correspond to its insert order in the graph.
        Specified by:
        getCost in interface IGraph
        Parameters:
        firstVertexNumber - The number (0 started) of the first vertex.
        secondVertexNumber - The number (0 started) of the second vertex.
        Returns:
        The cost of the walk between those two vertices. The cost is the duration associated with the Path object related to the vertices.

      • isArc

        public boolean isArc(int initialVertexNumber,
                     int terminalVertexNumber)
        Checks if an arc exists in the graph.
        Specified by:
        isArc in interface IGraph
        Parameters:
        initialVertexNumber - The number of the initial vertex. (starts to 0)
        terminalVertexNumber - The number of the terminal vertex. (starts to 0)
        Returns:
        True if the directed arc exists, false otherwise.

      • addPath

        public void addPath(Path path)
        Adds a Path to the current graph. Ignore it if path is null.
        Parameters:
        path - The Path to add.

      • indexAsPath

        public Path indexAsPath(int initialVertexNumber,
                        int terminalVertexNumber)
        Finds the path associated with the first node having the initialVertexNumber number and the last node having the terminalVertexNumber number.
        Parameters:
        initialVertexNumber - The number of the first node of the path to find.
        terminalVertexNumber - The number of the last node of the path to find.
        Returns:
        The path if it exists, null otherwise.
